summary: Frontend testing completed for Wallets page refactoring. All P0 features verified working correctly including Wallet Intelligence section, Decision Score with formula tooltip, Current State indicator, action button tooltips, Alert modal with 4 alert types including Exit/Degradation Alert, and Top Wallets grid with search/filter functionality.

issues: Console warning: Chart width/height -1 error from recharts component (non-blocking, likely in collapsed section)

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Console shows recharts warning about chart dimensions being -1. This appears in BehaviorFingerprint or AdvancedRiskFlags components when collapsed. Consider adding minWidth/minHeight to chart containers.
seed_data_creation: N/A - All data is MOCKED/hardcoded in React components
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 features for Wallets page refactoring are working. Tested: 1) Wallet Intelligence with VERDICT (FOLLOW) and Decision Score (85/100), 2) Current State indicator showing 'Accumulation → Stable' with info tooltip, 3) Decision Score tooltip with formula breakdown (35% Reliability, 25% Low Risk, 25% PnL Consistency, 15% Market Alignment), 4) Track Wallet button tooltip, 5) Copy Signals button tooltip (read-only nature), 6) Alert on Changes button tooltip (state-based alerts), 7) Alert modal with 4 alert types (Behavioral Shift, Narrative Entry, Risk Threshold, Exit/Degradation Alert), 8) Exit/Degradation Alert triggers verified, 9) What Happens If You Follow section with replicability tooltip, 10) Top Wallets grid with search and filter functionality. All data is MOCKED in frontend components.

wallet_intelligence_section.details: VERDICT 'FOLLOW' displayed with High Confidence badge, Decision Score 85/100

current_state_indicator.details: 'Accumulation → Stable' (last 14d) with info tooltip showing 'Based on net flows, hold duration, and realized PnL distribution'

decision_score_tooltip.details: Formula breakdown: 35% Reliability (82), 25% Low Risk (88), 25% PnL Consistency (78), 15% Market Alignment (100)

track_wallet_tooltip.details: 'Adds to Watchlist • Enables Alerts • Shows in Market → Tracked Wallet Activity'

copy_signals_tooltip.details: 'Shows theoretical entry points based on wallet actions. Execution latency and slippage not included.'

alert_on_changes_tooltip.details: 'State-based alerts only (not price-based). Behavioral, narrative, risk, and exit signals.'

alert_modal.details: Opens correctly with 4 alert types: Behavioral Shift, Narrative Entry, Risk Threshold, Exit/Degradation Alert

exit_degradation_alert.details: Triggers: Shift from Accumulation → Distribution, PnL decay over rolling 14 days, Risk score ↑ +20 in 7 days, Sell pressure on top holdings

what_happens_if_you_follow_tooltip.details: Shows replicability info: 'Estimated impact based on historical behavior over Last 90 days. Replicability: Medium. 71% profit captured within first 12h of position opening'

top_wallets_grid.details: Search filters by wallet name/address, filter buttons (All, Smart Money, Whale, Fund) work correctly
